content: a small plushie sheep with fluffy wool and a cute little face all of the stitches used are pretty basic so it s pretty beginner friendly the hardest part is working with the fluffy pipsqueak yarn because you can t see your stitches **materials** - bernat pipsqueak or similar fluffy yarn - bernat premium or similar worsted weight acrylic yarn - 3 5mm hook - 5 0mm hook - pair of 12mm safety eyes - stuffing - black embroidery thread or yarn **abbreviations** magic_ring= magic_ring single_crochet= single_crochet increase- increase round s = round s decrease= decrease st s = stitch es double_crochet= double_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch chain= chain
